00001 #include "Starfield.h"
00002 #include "CaelumSystem.h"
00003 #include "GeometryFactory.h"
00004 
00005 namespace caelum {
00006 
00007 const Ogre::String Starfield::mStarfieldDomeResourceName = "CaelumStarfieldDome";
00008 
00009 Starfield::Starfield (Ogre::SceneManager *sceneMgr) {
00010   GeometryFactory::generateSphericDome (mStarfieldDomeResourceName, 32, GeometryFactory::DT_STARFIELD);
00011   mNode = sceneMgr->getRootSceneNode ()->createChildSceneNode ();
00012   Ogre::Entity *ent = sceneMgr->createEntity ("StarfieldDome", mStarfieldDomeResourceName);
00013   ent->setMaterialName (CaelumSystem::STARFIELD_MATERIAL_NAME);
00014   ent->setRenderQueueGroup (Ogre::RENDER_QUEUE_SKIES_EARLY + 1);
00015   ent->setCastShadows (false);
00016   mNode->attachObject (ent);
00017 
00018   mInclination = Ogre::Degree (0);
00019 }
00020 
00021 Starfield::~Starfield () {
00022   // TODO: Detach and destroy all attached objects.
00023   static_cast<Ogre::SceneNode *>(mNode->getParent ())->removeAndDestroyChild (mNode->getName ());
00024 }
00025 
00026 void Starfield::preViewportUpdate (const Ogre::RenderTargetViewportEvent &e) {
00027   Ogre::Camera *cam = e.source->getCamera ();
00028   mNode->setPosition (cam->getRealPosition ());
00029   if (cam->getFarClipDistance () > 0)
00030     mNode->setScale (Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_SCALE * (cam->getFarClipDistance () - CAMERA_DISTANCE_MODIFIER));
00031   else
00032     mNode->setScale (Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_SCALE * (cam->getNearClipDistance () + CAMERA_DISTANCE_MODIFIER));
00033 }
00034 
00035 void Starfield::setInclination (Ogre::Degree inc) {
00036   mInclination = inc;
00037 }
00038 
00039 void Starfield::update (const float time) {
00040   Ogre::Quaternion orientation = Ogre::Quaternion::IDENTITY;
00041   orientation = orientation * Ogre::Quaternion (Ogre::Radian (mInclination + Ogre::Degree (90)), Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_X);
00042   orientation = orientation * Ogre::Quaternion (Ogre::Radian (time * 2 * Ogre::Math::PI), Ogre::Vector3::UNIT_Y);
00043 
00044   mNode->setOrientation (orientation);
00045 }
00046 
00047 } // namespace caelum
